item.title: Apple Nears Deal to Pay Google Roughly $1 Billion a Year for Siri AI Model - Bloomberg.com
item.description:
1. Apple Nears Deal to Pay Google Roughly $1 Billion a Year for Siri AI Model  Bloomberg.com
